data.name: useRef
notes: It is used to count how many times a page is re-rendered ,page is re-renderes when a state is updated, the question comes, why we can't measure the re-rendering using useState? The Answer is simple: useState also cause itself, rendering when state updates, in this way, it causes infinite loop
useRef is used to Access the DOM Elements directly without interacting with Virtual DOM
To keep history of previous value of state after updation
To check how many times a page is re-rendered during state Change
